text: was a Japanese aristocrat and government official of the early Heian period.Ohno no Mataka - Kotobank (in Japanese) He was the son of Ohno no Nao.Konoefu bunin p.563 - Google Books (in Japanese) Ohno no Mataka served at a high rank at court for a long time during the early Heian period. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Tei Morita Shokunihonkoki (Last volume) Kodansha, 2010 Category:782 births Category:843 deaths
title: Ohno no Mataka
